meanings.definition: The action or method of storing something.
meanings.sent1: Organizing our storages helps us find things easily.
meanings.sent2: The storages in the garage are overflowing with tools.
meanings.sent3: I tried to use my brain as a storage, but it kept forgetting!
meanings.sent4: Her heart was a storage of memories, both happy and sad.
meanings.sent5: The attic was a dark and dusty storage of forgotten treasures.

meanings.definition: The amount of space available for storing items.
meanings.sent1: The new house has ample storages for all our belongings.
meanings.sent2: We need to declutter to make more room in the storages.
meanings.sent3: The storage in the pantry is like a game of Tetris, fitting everything in.
meanings.sent4: Her mind had limited storage for new information, like an old computer.
meanings.sent5: The storage under the bed was a hidden space for secret treasures.

meanings.definition: A place where items are stored.
meanings.sent1: The storage in the basement is perfect for seasonal decorations.
meanings.sent2: The self-storage facility offers units in various sizes.
meanings.sent3: The storage room became a hideout for the kids during hide-and-seek.
meanings.sent4: His heart was a storage of love for all those around him.
meanings.sent5: The storage shed in the backyard held gardening tools and pots.
